_header: Good day Sir Christmas our King / for every man
_description: A Christmas carol — five quatrains (aaab) with ‘Good day’ refrain and burden: ‘Go day go day / My lord syre cristemasse go day’

BodArcSelB26.First Lines:
Go day Syre crystemas our Kyngfor euery man boþ olde &
                    ȝyngeys glad & blithe of ȝour comyngeGo
                    day…
BodArcSelB26.Last Lines: …My semely lorde for ȝoure sakeGood day
